typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_ID as integer,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as date,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as date,
		Certification_End_Date as date,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS as integer,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS as integer,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Certification_Type_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsForDelete
SelectColumnsForDelete aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period),
	UniqueCount = count()) ~> AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod
AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod alterRow(deleteIf(UniqueCount>0)) ~> AlterRowDelete
AlterRowDelete sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Reporting_Period'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelationalDelete
